WITH RECURSIVE time_slots AS ( SELECT TIME('09:00:00') AS slot_time UNION ALL SELECT slot_time + INTERVAL 1 HOUR FROM time_slots WHERE slot_time < '17:00:00' )
SELECT s.staff_cd, s.staff_nm, s.staff_addr, ts.slot_time, a.as_cd, a.as_date, a.as_addr FROM T_STAFF s CROSS JOIN time_slots ts LEFT JOIN T_AS a ON s.staff_cd = a.staff_cd AND DATE(a.as_date) = #{date} AND TIME(a.as_date) = ts.slot_time AND a.use_yn = 'Y' WHERE s.staff_addr LIKE CONCAT(#{region}, '%') ORDER BY s.staff_cd, ts.slot_time;

SELECT s.staff_cd FROM t_staff s JOIN t_as a ON a.staff_cd = s.staff_cd WHERE DATE(a.as_date) = #{date} AND s.staff_addr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{addr}, '%') AND TIME(a.as_date) != #{time} AND s.use_yn = 'Y' AND a.use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY s.staff_cd ORDER BY COUNT(*) ASC LIMIT 1;
